ec.Prototype, ec.Setup, ec.steadystate.SteadyStateBSourceForm, ec.util.RandomChoiceChooser, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MockSpatialCrossoverPipeline
public class SpatialCrossoverPipeline
extends ec.gp.koza.CrossoverPipeline

This crossover pipeline is designed to work with subpopulations implementing the Space interface. Crossover only occurs between the individual of interest for the current thread, and genetic material is only recruited from spatially local sources if it is required.

Author:
ruppmatt
See Also:

doCrossOver

protected void doCrossOver(ec.EvolutionState state,
                           int thread,
                           int subpopulation,
                           ec.Individual[] products)
The method that actually performs the crossover

Parameters:
state - The current evolution state
thread - The current thread
subpopulation - The subpopulation being bred
products - Will store the products from the cross-over; the calling method's responsibility is to place them correclty.

produce

public int produce(int min,
                   int max,
                   int start,
                   int subpopulation,
                   ec.Individual[] inds,
                   ec.EvolutionState state,
                   int thread)
The bulk of this method is grafted from koza.CrossoverPipeline. The main change is that the current individual being evaluated must be used as the first parent individual; the second individual must be a random neighbor.

Overrides:
produce in class ec.gp.koza.CrossoverPipeline
